name: Candy Panic
description:
It's Halloween and that can only mean one thing: TRICK OR TREAT!

Go around your neighbourhood and ring doorbells to collect as many candies as you can... but BEWARE! There's a bully on the loose!

Controls:

-Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move, and hold Space Bar to collect the candies.

_________

This is our 2nd submission to itch.io game jams. The team is formed by:

-Adoankim: development, game design and music/sound.
-Krrjuus: artwork, animations and vfx.
